      • get

      • isWritesLaxPrecision

        public boolean isWritesLaxPrecision()
        Returns:
        true if this is allowed to encode Vector values using fewer bytes, possibly losing precision. In particular this means that floating point values will be encoded as floats, not doubles.

      • setWritesLaxPrecision

        public void setWritesLaxPrecision(boolean writesLaxPrecision)
